title: Jenkins and Jonez - The Lakers Experiment Is Over + Torres Fontain On Being A South Carolina Practice Player
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - The Lakers Experiment Is Over + Torres Fontain On Being A South Carolina Practice Player
description:
The guys discuss the Russell Westbrook experience and the Lakers missing the playoffs and Kansas beating North Carolina in the men’s championship game before bringing on Torres Fontain, a former practice player for the South Carolina women’s team, to explain what it’s like being a practice player and what makes Dawn Staley such a great coach.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
